1.0.name: wordpress/wmd-admin
1.0.description:
WMD_Admin is a Worpdress plugin which makes WMD the default posts editor in the admin interface.

More

I'm Thomas Pelletier pelletier.thomas@gmail.com / http://thomas.pelletier.im/ and this is my first Worpdress plugin. Feedbacks/patches appreciated!

Download / Feedbacks / Plugins on the Bitbucket page: http://bitbucket.org/Kizlum/wp-wmd-admin/
